==Chinese==
{{zh-forms}}

===Etymology===
In ancient Chinese warfare, the signal for advancing was the beating of a drum ({{zh-l|擊鼓}}), whereas the signal for recalling the troops was the sounding of the gongs ({{zh-l|鳴金}}).
